name: part_006
file: tmp_【#マリン出航3DLIVE】ゲストとワイワイ！Marine Set Sail!! Concert!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [vLGCYbnYhPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka and Houshou Marine perform 'Tondemo-Wonders' on a red and black themed stage.
Omaru Polka and Houshou Marine have a short MC segment after their performance.
A brief interlude as the stage transitions for the next song.
Houshou Marine, Ookami Mio, and Minato Aqua perform 'Usseewa'.

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: 地平線までごシェアで　心で出番で Let's go!
subtitles.english: Share it all to the horizon, it's our heart's turn, Let's go!

subtitles.original: どうなることかな　どうです今日のご機嫌盤は
subtitles.english: I wonder how it'll go, how's the mood board today?

subtitles.original: さあコンテスト　混同してしまっちゃうんでしょ Oh yeah!
subtitles.english: Come on, a contest, we're bound to get mixed up, right? Oh yeah!

subtitles.original: アップダウンなテンションで参っちゃってんの早々
subtitles.english: Up and down goes the tension, I'm already losing it.

subtitles.original: ドバッと吹き出すのは　本音の独り言
subtitles.english: What's gushing out is a monologue of true feelings.

subtitles.original: 全然興味ない！
subtitles.english: Not interested at all!

subtitles.original: 特に勘弁ない！
subtitles.english: Especially no mercy!

subtitles.original: 伏せ込んで　絶対絶対！？
subtitles.english: Lying low, absolutely, absolutely!?

subtitles.original: 合図を奏でて　ブラブラブラ　Yeah yeah!
subtitles.english: Play the signal, blah blah blah, Yeah yeah!

subtitles.original: ほら集まって　夜更けだ！
subtitles.english: Look, gather round, it's late at night!

subtitles.original: Yeah yeah! 鳴いていこう！
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah! Let's howl out!

subtitles.original: パランパランパランパラン...
subtitles.english: Param param param param...

subtitles.original: ハチャメチャになっちゃえよ！
subtitles.english: Let's go crazy!

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: 踊りだせ　踊りだせ　孤独はさっき舞い踊れ
subtitles.english: Dance, dance, dance away the loneliness from before.

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: 地平線までごシェアで　今宵もあっぱれパーティータイム
subtitles.english: Share it all to the horizon, another splendid party time tonight.

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: 笑ったもん勝ちを　いざ召し上がれ
subtitles.english: Victory goes to the one who laughs, now help yourselves.

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: Woah-oh-oh!
subtitles.english: Woah-oh-oh!

subtitles.original: 地平線までお元気で　ここらでバイバイ Let's go!
subtitles.english: Stay well all the way to the horizon, bye-bye for now, Let's go!

subtitles.original: あはは！ということで、ポルカちゃんが来てくれましたー！
subtitles.english: Ahahaha! So, Polka-chan joined us!

subtitles.original: おわり尾丸ポルカでしたー！
subtitles.english: That's all from Omaru Polka!

subtitles.original: Yeah! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Yeah!

subtitles.original: マブダチ感あふれてる！
subtitles.english: We're giving off total bestie vibes!

subtitles.original: 色合いがさ、ちょうどいいよねこのステージ。
subtitles.english: The colors of this stage are just perfect, aren't they?

subtitles.original: そうなのそうなの、このステージとね。
subtitles.english: Exactly, exactly, with this stage and everything.

subtitles.original: 船長とポルカってさ、揃ったらさ、うちら無敵感あるじゃん。
subtitles.english: When Senchou and Polka get together, we feel invincible, don't we?

subtitles.original: え、なに？マブダチ？
subtitles.english: Wait, what? Besties?

subtitles.original: マブダチだよね！ずっとだよね！
subtitles.english: We're besties, right? Forever, right?

subtitles.original: ポルカとの思い出全然ないけどな。
subtitles.english: I have zero memories with you though.

subtitles.original: 最悪なのお前！帰れよ！お前が帰れよ！
subtitles.english: You're the worst! Go home! You go home!

subtitles.original: 出航！！
subtitles.english: Set sail!!

subtitles.original: あ、待って、誕生日尺あるから、ちょっとまだ帰らないで。
subtitles.english: Wait, I have a birthday segment, so don't leave just yet.

subtitles.original: 尺とか言うなよ！
subtitles.english: Don't call it a "segment"!

subtitles.original: まだ帰らないで、もうちょっと話そう？
subtitles.english: Don't leave yet, let's talk a bit more.

subtitles.original: あのさ、どこに出航するの？これって。どっか行っちゃうの？
subtitles.english: By the way, where are we setting sail to? Are you going somewhere?

subtitles.original: 君の心に出航！
subtitles.english: Setting sail for your heart!

subtitles.original: ポルカも出航しちゃいそうな気分になってきた？
subtitles.english: Are you starting to feel like setting sail too, Polka?

subtitles.original: ポルカもなんか出航したい！マリンで出航したいな。
subtitles.english: I want to set sail too! I want to set sail with Marine.

subtitles.original: え、ちょっとそれ隠語だからやめてください。
subtitles.english: Hey, that sounds like slang, so please stop.

subtitles.original: なんなんだよ！出航ってなんなの？
subtitles.english: Come on! What even is "setting sail"?

subtitles.original: じゃあここで聞くけど。
subtitles.english: Well, I'll ask you right here.

subtitles.original: え、ここで今ここで言うんですか！？
subtitles.english: What, you're going to say it here, right now!?

subtitles.original: あ、ごめんなさい時間なんで、ポルカ帰ります！
subtitles.english: Oh, sorry, out of time, so I'm heading out!

subtitles.original: バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: 出航！ヤサロス！
subtitles.english: Set sail! Yasoros!

subtitles.original: 正しさとは
subtitles.english: What is righteousness?

subtitles.original: 愚かさとは
subtitles.english: What is foolishness?

subtitles.original: それが何か見せつけてやる
subtitles.english: I'll show you exactly what they are.

subtitles.original: ちっちゃな頃から優等生　気づいたら大人になっていた
subtitles.english: A model student since I was small, before I knew it, I'd grown up.

subtitles.original: ナイフのような思考回路　持ち合わせる訳もなく
subtitles.english: With no such thing as a razor-sharp thought process.

subtitles.original: でも遊び足りない　何か足りない　困っちまうこれは誰かのせい
subtitles.english: But I haven't played enough, something's missing, it's a problem and it's someone's fault.

subtitles.original: あてもなくただ混乱するエイデイ
subtitles.english: Just aimlessly confused every day.

subtitles.original: 最新の流行は当然の把握　経済の動向も通勤時チェック
subtitles.english: Naturally grasping the latest trends, checking economic shifts during the commute.

subtitles.original: 純情な精神で入社しは　社会人じゃ当然のルールです
subtitles.english: Joining the company with a pure spirit, it's a natural rule for a working adult.

subtitles.original: はぁ？うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ　あなたが思うより健康です
subtitles.english: Huh? Shut up, shut up, shut up, I'm healthier than you think.

subtitles.original: 一切合切凡庸な　あなたじゃ分からないかもね
subtitles.english: Being completely and utterly mediocre, you probably wouldn't understand.

subtitles.original: あぁよく似合う　その可もなく不可もないメロディ
subtitles.english: Ah, it suits you well, that melody that's neither good nor bad.

subtitles.original: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ　頭の出来が違うので問題はナシ
subtitles.english: Shut up, shut up, shut up, our brains are built differently, so there's no problem.

subtitles.original: つっても私も半人前　殴ったりするのはノーサンキュー
subtitles.english: That said, I'm still just a novice, so no thanks to the punching.
